commenter_a: We've had 6 years of progressive liberal foreign policy. It can be summed up as alienate our allies, embolden our enemies, abandon our gains and weaken American prestige throughout the world. Obama has managed to squeeze this in between rounds of golf.
post_message: It’s time for progressives to outline a coherent, proactive foreign policy vision. Check out my op-ed on Medium where I share my ideas and add yours at www.chanceforpeace.org.
